languages.text:
Хрипом предсмертным ответил ему Доппельгрендель:
"Не почитатели Архиврага нас сгубили, собрат,
Нелюдь презренная нашей брони не коснулась,
Не одолели малефики темной волшбою.
В спину убили нас люди, что в дружбе клялись,
Сами предательский план замышляя во злобе".

In its death rasp,
the Doppelgrendel answered—
'Brother, we were doomed
not by the Archenemy's followers,
nor by the despicable inhumans,
who did not touch our armour,
nor with dark sorcery
did the malefics defeat us.
No, it was the humans,
who oaths of friendship swore,
that plunged the blade into our back,
their treacherous plot
in malice hatched.'"
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
死の淵で
ドッペルグレンデルは答えた…
『兄弟よ、我々は絶望の運命にあった
我々の鎧の触れなかった
渾沌の勢力の下僕たちによってではなく
卑劣な人間たちによってでもない
我々は邪悪な
闇の魔術で倒されたのでもない。
友情の誓いを交わした
人間どもが
我々の背中に刃を突き立てた
邪悪さが芽生えて
奴らは裏切った」
languages.original_text:
In its death rasp,
the Doppelgrendel answered—
'Brother, we were doomed
not by the Archenemy's followers,
nor by the despicable inhumans,
who did not touch our armour,
nor with dark sorcery
did the malefics defeat us.
No, it was the humans,
who oaths of friendship swore,
that plunged the blade into our back,
their treacherous plot
in malice hatched.'"

人間どもが
我々の背中に刃を突き立てた
邪悪さが芽生えて
奴らは裏切った」

languages.text:
在临终的喘息声中，
化身者开口答道——
‘兄弟，毁灭我们的，
不是混沌大敌的爪牙，
不是卑劣无耻的异形。
在对付我们时，
敌人也未使用黑暗的巫术。
不，毁灭我们的是人类，
他们曾与我们立下友谊的盟约，
却以剑刺向我们的背脊，
他们的背信弃义
早已酝酿已久。’”
languages.original_text:

the Doppelgrendel answered—

早已酝酿已久。’”

languages.text:
Dans un ultime râle,
le doppelgrendel répondit :
"Nous étions condamnés, mon frère.
Ni les disciples du Grand Ennemi,
ni les méprisables non-humains
incapables d'érafler nos armures,
ni la noire sorcellerie maléfique
ne vinrent à bout de nous.
Non, ce sont les humains qui,
reniant leurs serments d'amitié,
nous poignardèrent dans le dos
pour servir leurs desseins perfides
nés de la malice de leur race."
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
Con su último aliento,
Doppelgrendel contestó:
"Hermano, no nos han condenado
ni los siervos del Archienemigo,
ni los inhumanos repulsivos,
que nunca atravesaron nuestra armadura
ni con negra hechicería
conjuraron nuestra derrota.
No, fueron los humanos,
con quien amistad juramos,
los que clavaron la daga en nuestra espalda,
con una conspiración traicionera
nacida de la maldad más rastrera"».
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
Mit ihrem Todesröcheln
antwortete die Doppelgrendel:
'Bruder, wir wurden verdammt
nicht von den Anhängern des Erzfeinds,
nicht von den widerwärtigen Unmenschlichen,
die unsere Rüstung nicht anrührten,
nicht mit dunkler Magie
besiegten die Ruchlosen uns.
Nein, es waren die Menschen,
die Freundschaft geschworen hatten,
sie rammten uns die Klinge in den Rücken,
ihr heimtückischer Plan
in Bosheit geschmiedet.'"
languages.original_text:

languages.text:
Ölümün kucağındaki Suretçalan,
Hırıltılı bir sesle cevapladı:
'Biz lanetlendik kardeşim.
Şerbaşı'nın takipçilerince değil;
Zırhımıza dokunmayan,
Aşağılık insan dışılarca da değil.
Karanlık sahirliğe başvuran
Kâfirlerce hiç değil.
Hayır! Bize dostluk
Yemini eden insanların
İhanetine uğradık.
Kötü niyetleriyle
Hainliklerini planladılar.'
languages.original_text:
In its death rasp,
the Doppelgrendel answered—
'Brother, we were doomed
not by the Archenemy's followers,
nor by the despicable inhumans,
who did not touch our armour,
nor with dark sorcery
did the malefics defeat us.
No, it was the humans,
who oaths of friendship swore,
that plunged the blade into our back,
their treacherous plot
in malice hatched.'"

traits.locale_text:
Ölümün kucağında hırıltılı bir sesle,
cevap verdi Suretçalan:
'Kardeşim, biz lanetlendik
Şerbaşı'nın takipçileri tarafından değil,
zırhımıza dokunmayan,
aşağılık insan dışılar tarafından da değil,
karanlık sahirlikle de
kâfirlere yenilmedik.
Hayır, bizlerle dostluk yemini eden,
insanlardı,
bizi sırtımızdan bıçaklayan.
Hain planları
kötü niyetle gerçekleşti.'
